track.name: The More I See You
comments: Neraudi, kad lietus nāk!
nothing is better than the great talent and musical arrangement offered .  Take me back to my Sinatra days.  I just love it

"great talent, great voice, great arrangement and a brilliant new comer! I enjoy him a lot and think he has an awesome voice! Swing feeling and incredible presence on stage! Great singer and great musician! " [2] I can't agree more!
Does anybody know if he's coming to South America?
I'll be there on Aug 18 in Monterrey!!!!!!!!
Great voice, great music.....i love it....
I love Michael buble!

This is really nice. I use to sing this song when I was performing in Japan some 30 years ago. I think I've been inspired to add it back to my repertoire and perform it here in Ghana, West Africa where I'm living, just closed down my own Jazz Club of 7 years and now performing at +233 on Thursdays. My International group would love playing this I'm sure, especially after they hear this version.
Every time  he sings it brings me to a  place i can't describe,.. he's euphonious
Buble, Buble Buble. Sexy.  All the women swoon for him. I'm one of them.
Makes my heart melt.
The mellower delivery of this song by Chris Montez is pretty classic too.
The Music for ....Las Vegas back in the time of the Rat Pack..
Geez...the more I see you, the more I want you.  Enough said.
I love this! amazing!

great talent, great voice, great arrangement and a brilliant new comer! I enjoy him a lot and think he has an awesome voice! Swing feeling and incredible presence on stage! Great singer and great musician!
Música maravilhosa!!!
ADOOOROOOO!
Tudo de bom!!!
